description.en: An elegant Yukata reserved for the seafaring warrior. This mystical garb is said to harness the power of the typhoon.
description.ar: An elegant Yukata reserved for the seafaring warrior. This mystical garb is said to harness the power of the typhoon.
description.br: Um elegante Yukata reservado para o guerreiro do mar. Diz-se que esta vestimenta mística concede o poder do tufão.
description.de: Ein eleganter Yukata, der dem seefahrenden Krieger vorbehalten ist. Dieses mystische Gewand soll die Kraft des Taifuns nutzen.
description.fi: An elegant Yukata reserved for the seafaring warrior. This mystical garb is said to harness the power of the typhoon.
description.fil: An elegant Yukata reserved for the seafaring warrior. This mystical garb is said to harness the power of the typhoon.
description.fr: Un yukata élégant réservé au guerrier des mers. On dit de cet habit mystique qu'il possède les pouvoirs du typhon.
description.id: Yukata yang elegan disediakan untuk prajurit pelaut. Pakaian mistis ini dikatakan memanfaatkan kekuatan topan.
description.it: An elegant Yukata reserved for the seafaring warrior. This mystical garb is said to harness the power of the typhoon.
description.jp: 海を駆ける戦士のために作られたエレガントな浴衣。風を巻き起こすともいわれる神秘的な衣服。
description.kr: 항해하는 전사를 위해 보존된 우아한 유카타입니다. 이 신비한 복장은 태풍의 위력을 발휘한다고 합니다.
description.nl: An elegant Yukata reserved for the seafaring warrior. This mystical garb is said to harness the power of the typhoon.
description.pl: An elegant Yukata reserved for the seafaring warrior. This mystical garb is said to harness the power of the typhoon.
description.ru: An elegant Yukata reserved for the seafaring warrior. This mystical garb is said to harness the power of the typhoon.
description.sp: Un elegante Yukata reservado para el guerrero del mar. Se dice que este atuendo místico aprovecha el poder del tifón.
description.sw: An elegant Yukata reserved for the seafaring warrior. This mystical garb is said to harness the power of the typhoon.
description.th: ชุดยูกาตะที่สง่างามสงวนไว้สำหรับนักรบเดินเรือ เครื่องแต่งกายลึกลับนี้กล่าวกันว่าใช้พลังของพายุไต้ฝุ่น
description.tw: 為航海戰士準備的優雅浴衣。據說這種神秘的服裝可利用颱風的力量。
description.vi: Một bộ Yukata thanh lịch dành riêng cho các chiến binh đi biển. Bộ quần áo thần bí này được cho là khai thác sức mạnh của cơn bão.
